Reviews.Title: wonderful camera
Reviews.Author: M. Garro
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my daughter for her 7th birthday.  She loves it and absolutely loves that it is pink.  It is easy to use and she really enjoys taking videos with it and watching them on the tv.  For anyone with a child who is interested in being a shutter bug and wants a good camera that is inexpensive, this is the camera for you.

Reviews.Title: Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: Christa Nickels "Picture taker"
Reviews.Content: This item is compact, easy to travel with.  The functions are basic and fairly effortless to use after reading the instructions.  The pictures come out clear.  Great camera if you are looking for a compact, simple to use, and basic picture taking camera.

Reviews.Title: GE-A735 7MP Digital Camera with 3X Optical Zoom (Pink)
Reviews.Author: T. Brotzman
Reviews.Content: This is a good camera for a teenager/student who just wants it to take pictures and messing around. This isn't a camera for someone who is really serious about getting extremely good quality pictures. I have had several problems with mine, and had to return it twice. But i keep it because i love pink and it is the size that is easy to carry around when all I want is my camera.

Reviews.Title: Decent Camera
Reviews.Author: Christina
Reviews.Content: This camera is okay overall, but I've had a couple issues with it. I've had this camera for almost a year. The battery life is horrible. This camera doesn't have recargeable batteries, and a two brand new batteries will die out fast. I'll be taking a couple pictures, then ten minutes later, they die. If you leave the batteries in the camera when it's turned off, for some reason they're near dead when you turn it back on less than five minuites later. It can get costly after a while. Another problem is the "face capture". The person has to be looking directly at the camera or it won't pick their face. I do like the quality of the images I get, most of the time. You have to hold this camera still, the slightest movement makes the picture blurry. But, sometimes it gives me nice pictures when the camera feels like cooperating. 7 megapixels for this price isn't bad.OverallPros:-Good price-7 Megapixels-Takes great outdoor pictures-Records decent movies-Recorded movies compadible with iTunesCons:-Short battery life-Face capture requires the person to look directly at camera-Easy to blur pictures unintentionally-Recorded videos aren't compatible with Windows Movie Maker or Windows Media Player-Doesn't always capture detail

Reviews.Title: good pictures. Bad battery connection
Reviews.Author: miss p
Reviews.Content: I received this camera 1 week ago and like it very much. It takes sharper pictures than my 3 year old sony cybershot that has 5.1 megapixels. It zoomed well and downloaded like a charm. My only problem was the batteries. It kept telling me my new batteried needed replacing the first time I turned the camera on. After trying 3 sets and turning it on and off 6 times it connected. The next day the same thing and again today. Tonight no problem. I have no way of returning it because it was a gift. If anyone else has dealt with this I would love to know how to fix this.

Reviews.Title: Great...for 6 months
Reviews.Author: Laura Mason "Laurie"
Reviews.Content: I loved this camera! Big screen in back, worked wonderfully....pics were clear....after 6 months, it quit working, for no reason.I guess buying 2 a year isnt that bad. This was around $100, so if yu dont mind that, i suggest buying it.

Reviews.Title: decent camera
Reviews.Author: Stacy Butkus "Stacy B"
Reviews.Content: I was happy with the camera until it fell (not a hard fall).  It is now inopperable after owning it 1 week.  Delicate mechanisms.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Camera
Reviews.Author: Bruce J. Wagner
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera and was amazed at all the cool features it came with. It is great quality small but definatly cool. Mine didn't come with a card but a new card (1gb) only cost me 10$ or you can get a generic one for 8$ like the PNY card. This camera has so many features I'm still figiting with it heh scene types like indoors,outdoors,fireworks and alot more. Then it has a video camera function which is excellent and with 1 gb you can record up to 30 minutes with sound. This also has a panaramic feature where you take 3 pictures and combine them to make a panoramic picture right on the cameras view. It has a 3X optical zoom which is great and I think a 8X digital zoom. with 1gb card you can take about 300 HQ pictures pop them on your computer or at a retailer with card reader "do it yourself" picture machines or print right from your computer. I reccomend getting Digital camera batteries as with all digital camera features/lcd screen/and variations of flash drain normal batteries quickly. So I will grab some very good camera batteries from energizer. And this camera has a energy saver mode it does shut off after a bit and turn off lcd after a bit. Overall excellent camera no problems.

Reviews.Title: good budget camerea
Reviews.Author: PabloFenixx
Reviews.Content: I used this camera for a short stop motion film and just personal picture taking, and it was great in both respects.  It had enough features to allow me to customize the view of the stop motion and my friends are all addicted to taking personal photos in panorama now.  One person was impressed that it stitches the panorama pictures together in the camera, but I don't know if that is unusual.  So far it's wonderful, but sometimes when you turn it on it will say the batteries are exhausted and then when you switch the two batteries with each other you hae full battery, its the only problem I've had, but it doesn't bother me considering how cheap it was and how ell it works.

Reviews.Title: Low price for low quality
Reviews.Author: BBC
Reviews.Content: I purchased this camera specifically with an upcoming vacation in mind after my old digital camera broke. This camera takes low-quality photos --blurry with poor color. You get what you pay for, I guess. On my second day of vacation, the camera would not turn on. I replaced the batteries with no luck. I had to use a disposeable camera for the rest of the trip since my brand new, two-day old camera died. Needless to say, I returned the camera immediately upon my return. Props to Amazon for issuing a quick refund.I recommend spending a little more for a better quality camera. This model proved to be low quality and, even worse, unreliable.

Reviews.Title: I Really Enjoy It
Reviews.Author: Billy F. Spillman "Mathew Miller"
Reviews.Content: Its a nice camera. Small and can fit in my pocket. Takes good video and good Pic ( good pics of you have the settings right, other wise kinda blurry )But the Video always comes out good and gets good sound, But the speakers are under the cam, So you have to watch were you hold it. OR you well cover the speakers and wont get any sound.The Flash is really good on here too. Iv taken pics in the dark and it makes it look like im in the day light.one thing i dont like is..I used to have this one camera and when ever i took a pic it saved the number of the pic, NOT the number of the time i took a pic. just the number on how many pics the camera as taken ever. So if i took 00001-00020 and then took the pics off of the card and into my comp and then took pics the next day it would start the save at 00021.BUTThis cam dose not save it like that. It saves the number by at the time you took it, So now when i take the pics off my card. i have to number them myself b4 saving them into a folderAnd of mine breaks like the other person he wrote a review. This ok i guess. For the price i cal order another one. As long as its at lest 6 months away, but if it breaks a 2nd time im looking for a new cam ;)

Reviews.Title: GE Camera
Reviews.Author: John R. Brynteson
Reviews.Content: I purchased this GE camera as the digital camera I was using broke and I needed to replace it quickly as my daily work involves taking pictures of properties for insurance purposes. I am so very pleased with this GE digital camera that I have decided to use it all of the time even though the other camera has been repaired. The ease of use, large viewing screen and compatability with my computer are the main reasons for my opinion. Ordering was very easy and dealing with Amazon is a definite plus.

Reviews.Title: Works good does what I need it to. A little slow but great,
Reviews.Author: Nicole M. Winchell
Reviews.Content: Works good does what I need it to. A little slow but great for popping in your purse the pictures are good, If i would have picked I still shoulda invested the extra $40 in canon.

Reviews.Title: GE digital camera very disapointing
Reviews.Author: D. Wilson
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 7 year old grandaughter for Christmas. She loved it at first. Then the lens kept getting stuck and she kept getting a lens error and the camera would just shut off. Since she loved the camera, I decided to just return it and get the same kind. I was thinking maybe it was just this camera, because all the reviews I read seemed pretty good. Well, the second camera was worse then the first. It would not turn on and off at times, the lens didn't work all the time and the quality of the picture was horrible. I would not recommend this camera to anyone. Needless to say, I returned it and have since got her a different kind. Hopefully, this one will be better than the last.

Reviews.Title: GE-A735 Digital Camera (pink)
Reviews.Author: Foxy2_angel
Reviews.Content: I gave this product to my best friends daughter for Christmas. When she opened it she was totally surprised with excitement. As she knows she always gets great gifts from my husband and I. She was so excited she wanted to start taking pictures right away. Even before she finished opening her gifts. LOLShe loves the idea that its a pink camera, although blue would have been better, but pink is great too, and she is 9 years old.Now here it is almost a month later, and she still loves and is using her camera almost everyday. Affordable and easy to use. This camera was a great gift, and a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Gift camera
Reviews.Author: L. C. Gomez-Valle
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived promptly and complete. However, the camera was bulkier than expected. Specially for a teen girl, which was the actual recipient of this gift.The camera is not bad for the price, but the features are hard to use(smile detection, etc) and does not work intuitively.  Keeping in mind a pink camera will be used mostly by girls, they shoot photos all day long. The batteries do not last long enough for a typical weekend.

Reviews.Title: Disappointed
Reviews.Author: Bernardo Falcao
Reviews.Content: Coming from G.E., I expected it to have good quality.  Maybe not like a Sony or Canon, but almost there.  I was very disappointed: the camera's functionality is cheap and of bad quality.  Had to return it!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera with one major drawback!
Reviews.Author: James L. Strong "max4urmoney"
Reviews.Content: Works as expected, WHEN IT WANTS TO WORK! Oftentimes, I have to turn it off and on repeatedly to get it to not say "batteries exhausted" even with new batteries. Haven't missed any "Kodak moments" because of this, but expect to. Otherwise has a lot of bells and whistles, more than I need.

Reviews.Title: pink camera.
Reviews.Author: Beverly Runnels
Reviews.Content: I had a lot of fun with this camera and it is easy to transfer the pics to my computer and show them online.

Reviews.Title: I love it
Reviews.Author: Mary M.
Reviews.Content: It works great! I have no problem. The camera was deliver on time. I love this camera , and had been looking for one for so time.

Reviews.Title: Replacement camers
Reviews.Author: Rev. Judith DeMarco
Reviews.Content: It is the same as the one I was using...did not have to learn anything NEW.Old dogs don't need new tricks.

Reviews.Title: Best Ever Point and Shoot
Reviews.Author: Shands
Reviews.Content: I am a photography nut and I have to say that this point and shoot is THE BEST I HAVE EVER HAD. Awesome pictures, great settings, easy to use. The sunset pics are incredible. I own a DSLR by Nikon and I am as happy with this point and shoot as I am with my big camera on Auto.

Reviews.Title: Good for a while...
Reviews.Author: Mugiwara
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera so I could take pictures on my cruise. I had no complaints about any of the pictures I took.  They came out fine.  The Focus time was a little slow, but I wasn't in a hurry.  I did notice pretty quickly, however, how rapidly the battery life drained.  A normal major name brand battery (non-lithium) will last approximately 2 hours. The Lithium batteries last much longer. However, even with those, my camera has a terribly annoying habit of not recognizing the battery as being charged.  Sometimes I will turn it on and it will display a screen that tells me the battery needs to be replaced, even after putting in new ones. I'll have to push the power button repeatedly sometimes up to 5 times before it will recognize that there is actually power there.After about a year of use, not constant by any means, the wheel at the top of the camera that switches between modes has become loose and sometimes will freely rotate between automatic picture taking and picture review. and it hard to turn at other points.The Pictures themselves are fine. I really do enjoy the panorama feature, and the scene mode does make a difference in different lighting settings. But, it's getting to be time for a new, less frustrating camera, and I think I'll be shopping around.

Reviews.Title: Camera is useless in low light/Night, not much better in day
Reviews.Author: Appleanche
Reviews.Content: There are many great cameras in the same <$100 range. This is not one of them and should be avoided at all costs.Most any camera can take a half decent picture in good lighting/outdoors, and this one isn't an exception. It's clear, color seems dull, but overall acceptable pictures.The biggest test tends to be the low light/indoors and this thing is an absolute joke. You have to have flash on for it to even somewhat focus for some reason, any photo I turned flash off (IE, Timesquare) it was just a blur, flash on had better results but it just made the picture seem dark and dank when in reality i was a bright area.Indoors with low lighting is the same result, you can either use the bad flash or get blurs.There really aren't any settings that help this and by the end of the day my Motorola Droid's camera pictures tended to turn out better, which really tells you about the camera.

Reviews.Title: Batteries don't last - neither does camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Sikora "Sukey"
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a basic digital camera and this camera was a big disappointment.  It stopped working after a little over a year (just past warranty).  I do not recommend it.

Reviews.Title: A cheap camera enough result
Reviews.Author: Fabio A. Contreras "fabioaco"
Reviews.Content: For the prcie that I got the camera, I think it giveme good results. I really like the panoramic function because achive a good ones pics; however sometimes has a issue.The scenes function is tight, but works if you need fast camera set for special enviroment

Reviews.Title: A very disappointing camera
Reviews.Author: Melinda Scott
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera basically for a class....not a photography class...and it took ok photos for that. It's annoying because every photo comes out differently, at least for me. Once every blue moon I'll get a decent photo. But overall, the pictures are very grainy and fuzzy. Not very clear at all.  Even when I use the image stabilizer mode, the pictures come out bad. Oh, and the white out...the white out is terrible. I have dark skin and the flash makes me look as pale as can be. Bottom line is you get what you pay for. I paid 85 dollars for this and I got 85 dollars worth of camera. You want good quality photos, save up and get a better and inevitably more expensive camera. I'm buying the Kodak EasyShare Z8612IS. I hear it has great photo quality...but we'll see. I got it on sale too. Hopefully I'll have better luck this time around.

Reviews.Title: DO NOT GET THIS CAMERA DOES NOT WORK
Reviews.Author: Stephanie Cole
Reviews.Content: absolutely terrible camera never turned on and battery went out very fast, i tried to return it but they did not let me probably because everyone else is trying to return it.

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Grandfather
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for a 13 year old.  She has  a point and shoot camera but wanted more pixels and zoom.  This was a good choice at a lower price compared to the big name cameras.  And the pink color was a big hit.

Reviews.Title: Drains your batteries!!!
Reviews.Author: Demiah
Reviews.Content: I got the camera as a Christmas gift for my daughter - the camera's quality is fantastic and takes good pics.  With that said, it drains the life out of batteries like nobody's business!  My daughter drained the batteries by noon on Christmas day, and drained another pair of AA's the day after.It's a great purchase if your kid can turn on the camera, point, shoot, then turn off: but if you have kids that tend to leave the lights on all day, and plays the tv, radio, and computer at the same time, you may want to consider upgrading to the camera with charging capabilities.Update: there are batteries that can handle the kid's needs.  They cost more, but well worth it.
